item.title: :anchor: Install
item.description: :beer: Homebrew nupoi supports installation via Homebrew. $ brew tap dangisho/nupoi $ brew install nupoi :muscle: Install yourself Clone the project from GitHub and compile it like follows. $ git clone https://github.com/dangishokouta/nupoi.git $ cd nupoi $ cargo build --release Then, cargo build the resultant nupoi executable on target/release directory.

item.title: :runner: Usage
item.description: CLI nupoi 0.1.2 Kota Dangisho Check for null in the dataset USAGE: nupoi [OPTION]ã€€<File> ARGS: <File> Path to data file OPTIONS: -h, --help Print help information -V, --version Print version information Sample Output $ nupoi test.csv index: 2 null: 1 index: 4 null: 1 index: 6 null: 2 index: 7 null: 3 :whale: Docker docker run --rm -it -v $PWD:/home/nupoi ghcr.io/dangishokouta/nupoi:latest The working directory in the docker container is /home/nupoi.
